content: stony point cowl is a cowl version of my be simple variations shawl it is a simple garter stitch cowl with eyelets and a picot bind-off knit in fingering weight yarn the cowl drapes beautifully and may be wrapped either once or twice around your neck for a warmer cowl the pattern could easily be adjusted to use a worsted weight yarn this cowl is a perfect one-skein project for many fingering or sock weight yarns
